name: Find the Best Airbnb Deals Automatically with Bright Data & n8n

user.name: Yaron Been
user.bio:
Building AI Agents and Automations | Growth Marketer | Entrepreneur | Book Author & Podcast Host

description:
# F

## Description

This workflow automatically searches Airbnb for the best deals in your target locations and saves them for later reference. It helps travelers find affordable accommodations by continuously monitoring listings and identifying properties that match your budget and preferences.

## Overview

This workflow automatically searches Airbnb for the best deals in your target locations and saves them for later reference. It uses Bright Data to scrape Airbnb listings and can filter results based on your preferences for price, amenities, and ratings.

### Tools Used

*   **n8n:** The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow.
*   **Bright Data:** For scraping Airbnb listings without being blocked.
*   **Spreadsheets/Databases:** For storing and comparing property deals.

## How to Install

1.  **Import the Workflow:** Download the `.json` file and import it into your n8n instance.
2.  **Configure Bright Data:** Add your Bright Data credentials to the Bright Data node.
3.  **Set Up Data Storage:** Configure where you want to store the Airbnb deals.
4.  **Customize:** Specify locations, date ranges, and your budget constraints.

## Use Cases

*   **Travelers:** Find the best accommodation deals for your trips.
*   **Digital Nomads:** Track affordable long-term stays in different locations.
*   **Property Managers:** Monitor competitor pricing in your area.

---

## Connect with Me

*   **Website:** [https://www.nofluff.online](https://www.nofluff.online)
*   **YouTube:** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Get Bright Data:** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

## üü¢ **Section 1: üß≠ Define & Trigger the Search**

### üß© Nodes:

1. ‚è∞ **Run Daily**
2. üõ† **Set Search Criteria**

---

### ‚ú® What's Happening Here:

#### ‚è∞ **Run Daily**

* This node is your **alarm clock** ‚è∞.
* It automatically **starts the workflow** based on a schedule (e.g., daily at 8:00 AM).
* You never need to click "Execute Workflow" manually again ‚Äî it's 100% hands-free.

> *‚ÄúImagine this as your personal assistant waking up every day to go find vacation deals for you.‚Äù*

#### üõ† **Set Search Criteria**

* This is where you **set your filters**: destination, travel dates, number of guests.
* For example:

  ```json
  {
    "location": "Los Angeles",
    "checkin": "2025-09-15",
    "checkout": "2025-09-20",
    "adults": 2
  }
  ```
* This data will be **used in the scraping URL** sent to Airbnb through Bright Data.

> *‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like telling your assistant: ‚ÄòLook for 2-person stays in LA from Sept 15‚Äì20.‚Äô‚Äù*

---

## üåê **Section 2: üöÄ Scrape & Extract Airbnb Data**

### üß© Nodes:

3. üåê **Scrape Airbnb via Bright Data**
4. üß† **Extract Price & Title**

---

### ‚ú® What's Happening Here:

#### üåê **Scrape Airbnb via Bright Data**

* This node **sends a request** to Airbnb using **Bright Data Web Unlocker**.
* Bright Data acts like a **stealth browser** üïµÔ∏è that avoids blocks and loads the real webpage for you.
* It fetches all the page data (even if Airbnb tries to hide it from bots).

> *‚ÄúImagine Bright Data as your super-sneaky browser that can go where others can't.‚Äù*

#### üß† **Extract Price & Title**

* The raw response from Airbnb (HTML or JSON) is **parsed** in this Code node.
* The code looks for:

  * üè∑Ô∏è **Listing Title**
  * üí∞ **Price per night**
* These are pulled out from the messy page code and transformed into clean data items.

> *‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like using a fine-tooth comb to extract the useful info from a messy travel brochure.‚Äù*

---

## üìÑ **Section 3: üßæ Store the Results**

### üß© Node:

5. üìÑ **Save to Google Sheets**

---

### ‚ú® What's Happening Here:

#### üìÑ **Save to Google Sheets**

* All the extracted data (titles and prices) are **stored row-by-row** in a Google Sheet.
* Each day adds a new set of listings, creating a full **price history** over time.
* You can use this sheet to:

  * Track **price changes**
  * Find **off-peak bargains**
  * Compare cities or time periods

> *‚ÄúThis is your digital notebook where every deal is neatly logged for review, comparison, or alerts.‚Äù*

---

    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:

=======================================

# üåü Automation Overview: ‚ÄúFind Best Airbnb Deals (Daily Tracker)‚Äù

This n8n workflow automatically scrapes Airbnb listings every day and records the **title and price** of each rental into **Google Sheets**, helping you track the best travel deals over time ‚Äî perfect for deal hunters, travel bloggers, or market researchers!

---

## üü¢ **Section 1: üß≠ Define & Trigger the Search**

### üß© Nodes:

1. ‚è∞ **Run Daily**
2. üõ† **Set Search Criteria**

### ‚ú® What's Happening Here:

#### ‚è∞ **Run Daily**

* This node is your **alarm clock** ‚è∞.
* It automatically **starts the workflow** based on a schedule (e.g., daily at 8:00 AM).
* You never need to click "Execute Workflow" manually again ‚Äî it's 100% hands-free.

> *‚ÄúImagine this as your personal assistant waking up every day to go find vacation deals for you.‚Äù*

#### üõ† **Set Search Criteria**

* This is where you **set your filters**: destination, travel dates, number of guests.
* For example:

  ```json
  {
    "location": "Los Angeles",
    "checkin": "2025-09-15",
    "checkout": "2025-09-20",
    "adults": 2
  }
  ```
* This data will be **used in the scraping URL** sent to Airbnb through Bright Data.

> *‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like telling your assistant: ‚ÄòLook for 2-person stays in LA from Sept 15‚Äì20.‚Äô‚Äù*

---

## üåê **Section 2: üöÄ Scrape & Extract Airbnb Data**

### üß© Nodes:

3. üåê **Scrape Airbnb via Bright Data**
4. üß† **Extract Price & Title**

---

### ‚ú® What's Happening Here:

#### üåê **Scrape Airbnb via Bright Data**

* This node **sends a request** to Airbnb using **Bright Data Web Unlocker**.
* Bright Data acts like a **stealth browser** üïµÔ∏è that avoids blocks and loads the real webpage for you.
* It fetches all the page data (even if Airbnb tries to hide it from bots).

> *‚ÄúImagine Bright Data as your super-sneaky browser that can go where others can't.‚Äù*

#### üß† **Extract Price & Title**

* The raw response from Airbnb (HTML or JSON) is **parsed** in this Code node.
* The code looks for:

  * üè∑Ô∏è **Listing Title**
  * üí∞ **Price per night**
* These are pulled out from the messy page code and transformed into clean data items.

> *‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like using a fine-tooth comb to extract the useful info from a messy travel brochure.‚Äù*

---

## üìÑ **Section 3: üßæ Store the Results**

### üß© Node:

5. üìÑ **Save to Google Sheets**

---

### ‚ú® What's Happening Here:

#### üìÑ **Save to Google Sheets**

* All the extracted data (titles and prices) are **stored row-by-row** in a Google Sheet.
* Each day adds a new set of listings, creating a full **price history** over time.
* You can use this sheet to:

  * Track **price changes**
  * Find **off-peak bargains**
  * Compare cities or time periods

> *‚ÄúThis is your digital notebook where every deal is neatly logged for review, comparison, or alerts.‚Äù*

---

## üéØ Why This Workflow is Powerful (Even for Beginners):

| Benefit üí°                   | Description                                                               |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üìÜ **Fully Automated**       | No manual work ‚Äî set it once and let it run every day.                    |
| üìä **Easy Tracking**         | Automatically builds a database of deals over time.                       |
| üíª **Low-Code & Expandable** | You can easily add filters, alerts (e.g., Telegram, email), or analytics. |
| üß∞ **Bright Data-Powered**   | Avoids bot detection and ensures clean, reliable data.                    |
